metadataAttributes.Title: Health Informatics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn To Tackle Health IT & Big Data the Right Way. Become a leader in the dynamic and rapidly growing field of health informatics.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science, Decision Support System, Health Informatics, Health Care, Informatics, health, Digital Health, Decision Analysis, Information Technology Planning, Strategic Leadership, Knowledge Acquisition, Decision Tree,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Harold P. Lehmann, MD, Ph.D. ,Ashwini S. Davison, M.D. ,Paul Nagy, PhD, FSIIM ,Hadi H. K. Kharrazi, MD, Ph.D ,Sam Meiselman ,
